text: Amizim guizbangɨra poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damighɨva Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzeghtɨ, dɨpar mɨsozir kam an aven mangɨva, mɨzazim a danɨngɨva, an borivtaribar amightɨ, da ekonamigh, navim buva an mɨkarzir mogomem ikuvigham. Eghtɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God an gumazamizibar tongɨn an ziam gasɨghasigham.
